Errors.CannotMoveWhileFocused: Cannot move while `focus` condition is active on token.

DontShowWelcome.Name: Don't show this message again
DontShowWelcome.Hint: Don't show the welcome application when Foundry first loads. (You can always undo this via Configure Settings).

combatStartSound.Name: Sound file for combat start
combatStartSound.Hint: If blank, no sound will be played. If set, the sound will be played when combat starts.
